```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)

library(tidyverse)

SDG <- rio::import(file = "../sdg_hackathon_data.csv")

```


```{r cars}
glimpse(SDG)
```

## quick plots

```{r cars}
SDG %>% 
  count(sdg) %>%
  ggplot(aes(x=sdg, y=n)) +
  geom_col() + 
  coord_flip() +
  theme_minimal()
  
```
